Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Draw two students holding cups with a string connecting them, attempting to communicate.
Show a basic string telephone setup with the string stretched between the two cups.
Attempt to depict how sound travels through the string by adding simple lines indicating movement.
CANNOT: Clearly show how sound travels through the string with arrows or detailed explanations (student may not fully understand sound transmission).
Label parts of the device accurately to explain the communication process (labels might be missing or incorrectly positioned).
Illustrate the function of the string telephone effectively, such as the importance of a taut string (student might draw a slack string, misunderstanding tension is necessary).
Represent how the device helps with communication over a distance beyond basic visual connection (e.g., technology aspect might be unclear or missing).
